name: Cookie Cool Match
description:
Connect colorful lines of cookies to solve compelling levels in this puzzle adventure! Make the cookie splash and you will enjoy the journey of yummy cookie.

Features:
- Variety of gameplays, awesome new characters!
- Spectacular boosters, splendid graphics!
- Challenging tasks, including free captured cookies!
- Hundreds of well-designed Free levels. Obstacles and game modes added regularly!
- Easy to learn, challenging to master, can you score 3 stars on each level?
